text: John Davan Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover, (2 November 1927 – 14 January 2022) was a British businessman and politician. He was the President of Sainsbury's. He was a member of the House of Lords as a life peer and member of the Conservative Party. He became a Knight of the Garter in 1992. Sainsbury died on 14 January 2022, at the age of 94.Sainsbury’s statement: Death of Lord Sainsbury of Preston Candover ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Conservative Life Peers Category:British businesspeople
title: John Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover
